text: Averino () is a rural locality (a village) in Ivanovskoye Rural Settlement of Vashkinsky District, Vologda Oblast, Russia. The population was 8 as of 2002.Данные переписи 2002 года: таблица 2С. М.: Федеральная служба государственной статистики, 2004. == Geography == The village is located 56 km south from Lipin Bor and 3 km from Ivanovskaya village. == References == Category:Rural localities in Vashkinsky District
title: Averino, Vologda Oblast
